title: E-commerce Platform Redesign
shortDescription: Complete redesign of an e-commerce platform focusing on user experience and conversion optimization.
description: This project involved a complete redesign of an e-commerce platform serving over 100,000 monthly users. The existing platform suffered from poor conversion rates, confusing navigation, and accessibility issues.

title: Mobile Banking App
shortDescription: Design of a secure and intuitive mobile banking application with focus on accessibility.
description: Designed a comprehensive mobile banking application that prioritizes security, accessibility, and user experience for a major financial institution.

title: Design System Creation
shortDescription: Comprehensive design system development for a SaaS platform including components and guidelines.
description: Created a scalable design system for a rapidly growing SaaS platform, establishing consistency across multiple product lines and improving development efficiency.

title: Healthcare Portal Redesign
shortDescription: Redesigning a patient portal to improve accessibility and user experience for healthcare management.
description: Redesigned a patient portal used by over 50,000 patients to manage appointments, view medical records, and communicate with healthcare providers.

title: Food Delivery App Prototype
shortDescription: Interactive prototype for a new food delivery service focusing on local restaurants and sustainability.
description: Created an innovative food delivery app concept that connects users with local restaurants while promoting sustainable practices and reducing food waste.

title: Educational Platform UX Research
shortDescription: Comprehensive UX research study for an online learning platform serving K-12 students.
description: Conducted extensive user research for an educational technology platform to understand student learning behaviors and improve engagement.
